adrFormatAddress: 505 Park Ave #3, New York, NY 10022-9303, USA

originalText.text: Helik is my hair stylist and the only person I've gone to for my curly cuts for about 10 yrs now. He is amazing! The front desk staff and the assistants are always friendly and accommodating upon entry to this beautiful salon.

text.text: Helik is my hair stylist and the only person I've gone to for my curly cuts for about 10 yrs now. He is amazing! The front desk staff and the assistants are always friendly and accommodating upon entry to this beautiful salon.

originalText.text:
Amazing location and amazing colorist! When you come here, see Alexis! She is amazing and she is easygoing and easy to talk to. If they treat you well as a hair model imagine how you will be treated if you were also as a client. Everyone there was so nice and super friendly. You're going to see Luis's (the owner) puppy just roaming around the salon like there's no care in the world. A pocket of cuteness!

Keep a lookout for Alexis when she is official in a few months and I hope you get to have her as your colorist because she is talented and very passionate. Passionate people who love their jobs will do an amazing job and will make sure you are happy before you walk out that elevator. I love my hair!

originalText.text:
Great place color.  Nicolette colored my my hair, I get compliments every day. It came out so beautiful.  I’m very pleased with how it came out.
Nicolette was very attentive and friendly.
Highly recommended!

originalText.text:
Vaughn is a master of his craft with a warm and welcoming delivery. Mizu Salon offers the excellence you expect from a Park Avenue address with zero pretense - they are here to make anyone who walks in look great.

My experience, 2020-07-08: I have baby fine & thinning hair I had long got clipped #2 with a couple inches on top at a barber. It was a workable approach - youthful but lacking in masculine warmth. Because COVID, I didn't get a cut for 4 months and started wondering what might be possible if I saw a top notch stylist. I did my research and found that Vaughn has styled an unbelievable number of famous people yet seemed (in online media) to carry himself as a human being like (most of!) the rest of us. So I made the appointment.

It was not cheap and I told him off the bat I couldn't afford to see him on a regular basis - but I absolutely got my money's worth. He gave me exactly what I had hoped for and I've had no problem styling it myself to look just as good as it did when I left, using a single paste product (his, but having used others I don't believe that's it; - it's the cut, plus me observing how he used the product). He told me the cut would last 6-8 weeks versus 3 for what I was doing before. And he introduced me to a stylist in the salon charging a lower rate. I will definitely try to find a way to return to Mizu, whether with Vaughn or colleagues. Best haircut of my life.

originalText.text: I went her to get my hair styled for a photo shoot I was having at my work.  I showed him a pic and it didn't come out at all like what I showed him.  I'm sad i had to sit through an hour of styling pay 100$ only to have to put my hair in pony tail because it really did not look good. I didn't have time to ask him to fix it. The guy was very nice but hair looks awful.  If you can't make something look like the picture shown then just say that. Really sad about my hair.
